flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3020>>3020 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3020-1200=<<3020-1200=1820>>1820 dollars.
#### 1820

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3200, not 3020. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
